title: These Studio Apartments Have Extra Large Closets & Built-In Shelving!
map_address: 5292 S Maryland Pkwy near Tropicana Ave.
app_fee: $45 application fee for credit and background screening
posting_body: ['Dorm style!!', 'Quail Ridge', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '5292 S Maryland Pkwy Las Vegas, NV 89119', 'Comfort, Location, and Convenience', 'Enjoy one of these stylish studios and take advantage of a vibrant community at Quail Ridge.', 'These studio layouts guarantee privacy with private entries and a locking entry door that opens up to a shared living and kitchen area.', 'Private bathrooms with showers are included as well.', 'Make yourself at home and add your own décor to built-in shelving.', 'Spacious closets with large mirrors add style and convenience to the layout.', 'Relax in the cooling comfort of central air or head outside to enjoy the breeze.', 'The community welcomes you with lush landscaping and expert gardening.', 'Enjoy property views while lounging poolside or with neighbors in the scenic courtyard.', 'Additional conveniences include on-site maintenance, package receiving, and a laundry facility.', 'Call today to learn more about what awaits at Quail Ridge!', 'Property Amenities:', '* Pool', '* Laundry', '* Clubhouse', '* Business Center', '* Short-Term Lease', '* Package Receiving', '* On-site Maintenance', '* On-site Management', '* Picnic Area with BBQ Grills', '* Transportation', 'Lease Terms:', '10,11,12', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Surface Lot Parking', 'Surface lot parking available.', 'Please call us regarding our Parking Policy.', 'Pet Policy:', 'No pets allowed.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'ConAm Management', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x254', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
